predicate.note: Frames file for 'outdistance' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to surpass by a wide margin

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` Even the 7.2 % return from the risk-free three-month Treasury bill has easily outdistanced the 4.1 % return from junk bonds , '' wrote [*T*-1] Moody 's economist John Lonski in yesterday 's market report .
example.arg: Even the 7.2 % return from the risk-free three-month Treasury bill
